alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:17PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perry, northwestern Garland, northwestern Saline, southwestern Yell and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Muddy Creek WMA, or 17 miles north of Mount Ida, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Muddy Creek WMA... Avant... Aplin... Nimrod... Wing... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Bluffton... Lena Landing Rec Area... Rover... Hamilton... Story... Sunlight Bay Park... Carter Cove Park... Chula... Macedonia in Yell County... Deberrie... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest
